200402.n: Sources and Methods for Late Republican History, 1938 to Present

200502.n: Sources and Methods for Late Republican History, 1938 to Present

catList: A close scrutiny of the İnönü years - comprising the tail end of the one-party period, and opening up to the transformation of the political régime in the post-war era - that simultaneously introduces the student to the ample primary sources of this crucial but often neglected era. Special focus on the Republican People's Party as a political organisation, and on the changing features of the one-party system, together with explorations of political, economic and cultural life. Aspects of Turkish foreign policy under İnönü. Frameworks of synchronic comparison with other one-party régimes, as well as of diachronic comparisons between the early and late phases of one-party rule in Turkey.
